name: Grapher metadata for dataset_448_social_expenditure_in_the_long_run__lindert_2004__oecd_1985__oecd__socx
description: Data-set put together by Marco Molteni under the guidance of Esteban. OECD (SOCX) on social spending are used as reference series and data are extrapolated backwards using OECD 1985.
